name: Ion
description: Loyalty and courage are her trademarks. A powerful armory is the source of her confidence.

passiveSkill.name: I'm the Third Saint
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "After Ion has dealt a 3-tier damage to an enemy, she deals additional ATK * {placeholder} true damage (ignores DEF, Block and DMG RES Rate)."}

uniqueSkill.name: Normal Judgment
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Ion deals a 3-tier damage. Tier 1: Swings her battleaxe to dispel target's Invincible status, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage. Tier 2: Stabs with a spear, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage to a column of enemies. Tier 3: Slashes with her greatsword while an artifact descends from heaven, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage to all enemies."}

specialSkill.name: Ordinary Combo
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Ion deals a 2-tier damage to an enemy, each tier deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Simple Crossbow
normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Ion deals a 3-tier damage. Tier 1: Swings her battleaxe to dispel target's Invincible status, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage. Tier 2: Stabs with a spear, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage to a column of enemies. Tier 3: Slashes with her greatsword while an artifact descends from heaven, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage to all enemies.
templateData.lens5.skill: After Ion has dealt a 3-tier damage to an enemy, she deals additional ATK * {placeholder} true damage (ignores DEF, Block and DMG RES Rate).
templateData.lens6.skill: Ion deals a 2-tier damage to an enemy, each tier deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}
